sections.heading: Ep 7. Talking with Peter Mercoulia from Merkon Constructions – taking pride in Construction and managing change

sections.content: In this week's episode, we talk with +[Peter Mercoulia (Jnr)](https://www.linkedin.com/in/peter-mercoulia-90253817/)+ who, along with his Brother and Cousin are taking over the reins of the successful Tier 3 commercial builder, +[Merkon Construction](https://www.merkon.com.au/)+.

Originally founded by Peter Mercoulia (Snr) and Jim Mercoulia – the brothers who founded the business 35 years ago, the 'new generation of the family are redefining a successful Melbourne builder and refining the organisation to meet the constant evolution required in Melbourne's Commercial Construction industry.
In amongst this podcast, we discuss:

items: The history and background to Merkon Constructions
Trying to control all the constant changes within the industry
Taking fulfilment from the building industry
Why change is important – "if it ain't broken, it can still be improved"
The merits of a 5-day work week
The benefits of bringing in transferable skills from outside construction, into a construction business

sections.content: If you have an interest in the Melbourne building industry, keen to understand the mindset and approach to managing a business within such a rapidly changing market – then you'll find Peters attitude and enthusiasm an enjoyable listen!

[The Building Talks Podcast](https://www.linkedin.com/company/the-building-talks-podcast/?viewAsMember=true) is brought to you by [Building Environs Recruitment](https://www.buildingenvirons.com.au/) – providing recruitment solutions to the property, construction, and related industries, here in Melbourne.
